live_updates: Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you

Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. A further update will be provided at 19:35 PT.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
57823.summary: Some customers in the Dunbar-Southlands area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57823.title: Feb 13 - Vancouver (Dunbar-Southlands) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
